__e: We were waiting for the right moment to tell you, which I guess is right now.
When we had ours, we barely told anybody.

We never thought, at this point, a baby. Mmm.
It's just that we were hoping for a bit more from you.
It didn't seem like actual entertainment that we've expected to see.
Finally the day we have been waiting for, has arrived.

Trade Minister. It's a lovely day and a long time coming.
